name: Novalia Ramadhanti
greetingText: May peace and blessings be upon you, Novalia!
wishText: May Allah grant you joy, success, and endless blessings. :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you, Novalia! May Allah's mercy be with you today and always.
text2: That's what I wanted to say by texting you a Whatsapp message.
text4: I realised, I wanted to make this
text5Content: You're bound to get something special
outroText: I hope this message made your day. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
replayText: Or click here to watch it again.
